autoReset: Auto reset when best time passed
powerUpDes: Watch AD to gain the power-up shield
lvlTarget3less: Complete the stage without failing less than <x> times
trophieDes_playh: Play the game for over one hour
trophieDes_gasping: Surface from swimming with one bubble left
tf3: With the kite you can fly!
tf4: Use the torch to blow up TNT!
tf5: Don't touch the water or you will lose your torch
tf6: Play new acts by standing on their act block
tf7: Jump from side to side to get up
tf8: Good job! Now go find the next act
tf9: Watch out! Grey blocks turn on and off
tf10: Follow the arrows to reach the end
tf11: While running, hold down to slide!
tf12: Like before, purple blocks are quite weak
tf13: Move with the arrowkeys or WASD
tf14: Orange blocks bounce you really high!
tf15: You can grab a pole to slide up and down
tf16: These portals teleport you to another place on the map
tf17: Obtain 3 stars in Act 1 to unlock Hard mode
tf20: Look out, your breath is running out! Swim by moving forward in the way you're facing
tf21: Brown blocks can be pushed either way!
tf22: Press down on a trapped block to kick it out
tf23: Jump while in the red section to swing forward
tf24: Jumping in the blue section swings your further
tf25: Change direction of your swing using left or right
tf26: Ice is slippery and melts over time!
tf27: Hold down in mid-air to kick and smash glass
tf28: Speed block move you in the direction shown!
tf29: To beat lasers you must be fast! Try use your kick ability by holding down mid-air
tf30: Use keys to unlock locked blocks
tf31: The portal is at the end of the locked blocks!
tf33: Hop in the cannon and press up when you want to be fired!
tf34: These small bubbles recharge your breathe underwater!
tf35: Watch out for the spark around the edge
tf36: Solar blocks disappear when the light are off!
tf37: If a spark touches the water it becomes electrified
tf38: Thank you for playing Vex 7! You're almost done...
tf39: Pink blocks go invisible the closer you get
tf41: You can look around the stage while standing still
tf42: This is it, the final test. If the wire beats you to the end, you'll have to redo the entire act!
tf44: Use SPACE button to fight enemies
tf44Mob: Use the attack button to fight enemies
tf45: Pick up jump potion to make an extra jump
tf46: Press up on a grapple pad to propel yourself to the hook
tf47: Press down or space to break block
tf47Mob: Press down or attack button to break block
tf48: Press down to use the lever to activate pulse block
tf49: Earn Tower coins for exclusive skins
